short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your Volunteer Information Portal to the next level

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are a volunteer with St John Ambulance WA, you will be familiar with the Volunteer Information Portal, or VIP. Add this extension to your Chrome browser to supercharge it!

What does this extension do?
- Allows you to easily see who is allocated to any activity with lots of yellow buttons!
- Prevents the automatic session timeout on VIP when you leave it open for too long
- Allows easy access to VIP and the intranet via the launcher by clicking the extension's button
- Fixes the "Read more" links on the homepage, meaning you can actually read the announcements!

Feature requests are welcome!
